attributes.action: Reinstate the Olympic Games Tug Of War competition
attributes.additional_details: Great Britain are the current Olympic Champions in the Tug Of War. The event was last held in the 1920 Games in Belgium. Richard House Children's Hospice, the closest children's hospice to this year's games, is calling on the Government to lobby the International Olympic Committee to bring back the event once more. It will prove that despite our economic and social struggles, we truly are a great, strong and powerful country on the world stage.
